Link to timeline of key events

TIMELINE

1651
Navigation Acts – Britain has the monopoly on American trade


1737
Walking “Purchase” Pennsylvania of Delaware land – approx 1200 square miles


1739
Stono Rebellion in South Carolina – largest slave rebellion in British mainland colonies


October 7, 1763
Proclamation Line of 1763


1773
Tea Act and Boston Tea Party


1774
Coercive Acts


Summer 1775
Olive Branch Petition


January, 1776
Thomas Paine publishes Common Sense


1819-20
Missouri Compromises


1837
Panic of 1837
